output.conclusion: By completing this course, you've gained a foundational understanding of Voice AI and its applications. You are now equipped to explore further and build your own voice-enabled experiences.
output.introduction: Welcome to the world of Voice AI! This course will guide you through the basics of Voice AI and its exciting applications, even if you have no prior experience.

chapters.description: An introduction to Voice AI, explaining what it is and how it works. Covers speech recognition, natural language understanding, and text-to-speech.

chapters.chapterTitle: Key Components of Voice AI Systems
chapters.description: Overview of the essential components like microphones, speakers, processing units, and cloud services.
Exploring popular applications like virtual assistants (Siri, Alexa, Google Assistant), voice search, and voice-controlled devices.
Deep dive into how voice assistants work, including wake words, command processing, and response generation.
Exploring how Voice AI is used to control lights, thermostats, entertainment systems, and other smart home devices.
Understanding how Voice AI is transforming customer service through chatbots and automated phone systems.

chapters.chapterTitle: Introduction to Voice AI Development Platforms
chapters.description: Overview of popular platforms like Dialogflow, Amazon Lex, and Microsoft Bot Framework for building Voice AI applications.

chapters.chapterTitle: Building a Simple Voice AI Application (Concept)
chapters.description: A high-level walkthrough of the steps involved in creating a basic Voice AI application, from design to deployment.
Discussing important ethical considerations like privacy, bias, and accessibility in the development and use of Voice AI.

modules.moduleTitle: Getting Started with Voice AI Development
